plot: Hwang Pyeong-san returns to Busan to reclaim his wife and avenge the death of his best friend at the hands of an underworld crime lord
title: Dolaon hanggui sanai
plot_es: Hwang Pyeong-san returns to Busan to reclaim his wife and avenge the death of his best friend at the hands of an underworld crime lord
plot_en: Hwang Pyeong-san returns to Busan to reclaim his wife and avenge the death of his best friend at the hands of an underworld crime lord
